values:
I've got to admit, iam proud of them, but I really wish they would've signed to a different label other than FBR.
But oh well, ya gotta start somewhere!
How cool is it though, that their new lead Vocalist Sierra has only been with them since January and now their signed, so thumbs up to Versa!
Maybe they'll finally come to California, other than their home state Floridia! so This is exciting.

Victory is sweet even deap in the cheat sheets...
How is everyone doing today?
I'm doing real great,
don't you just wish you could sleep all day 
and sit at the window and drink tea when you awake?
freedom.
well anyways!
im excited, the band that I auditioned for...welll iam in!
Iam their new lead vocalist and our first gig is in 3 weeks, scary much?
and not to mention I need to at least write lyrics for two songs,
but its a christian band so Im kinda stuck,
anyone have any ideas?

6:03 P.M. when will I ever see you again? 2 years have passed, and I still can remember everything
there's no convincing, you still talk the way you used to,
but your love is killing me..
I can still remember your scent it follows me everywhere, 
I can't forget the way you would embrace a hug,
I can't make this jealousy go away,
your killing me.
My love for you will never change, it will always be you...it has been for two years now.

The stoplight turns green,
and everybody leaves without waving goodbye...
people leave and you just have to move on
but im sick of your presence in my dreams..
im sick of your smile, that I cannot remember,
im sick of your voice,
im sick of the way your hair falls just right below your mesmerizing blue eyes.
im sick of how I feel for the first time we kiss,
Im sick of how I hope of what "we could be"
Im sick of basing my life on you.
im sick of the fact that I can only see myself with you,
im sick of my relationships not working, because my love for you is strong.
Im sick of you loving me.
Im sick of feeling theres a part of me missing because your gone.
but im mostly sick of not being with you.
feel you, touch you, kiss you, lay with you, drink tea with you, watch movies, finallyy being truly happy.

stop the bleeding

He doesn't ask much of us.
He wants us to believe.
He doesn't want us to envy, but to love
Why do we not do these things so easily?


(chorus)
we're called to hold our hands,
against the wounds of a broken world, 
to stop the bleeding,
Heal the wounded.
Look at what our world has become.


He gives us faith.
He gives us choice.
He heals our broken hearts,
Why not trust him?

(chorus)
we're called to hold our hands,
against the wounds of a broken world, 
to stop the bleeding,
Heal the wounded.
Look at what our world has become.


Please don't ignore the bad things,
help this world...
and understand, there needs to be changes..

(chorus)
we're called to hold our hands,
against the wounds of a broken world, 
to stop the bleeding,
Heal the wounded.
Look at what our world has become.

Im torn apart,
my hands are shaking,
my heart is racing
with my undying love for you.
I've used up all of my tears.
Im searching for your heart,
but its turned to cold stone, baby.
As I lay here all alone,
my aching heart bleeds no more,
breathing in the pain you've brought upon me.

Im tired of all the lies, pulsating through my veins. Im tired of looking in the mirror. im tired of looking into your stone cold eyes. Where you manipulate her for sex. Its too late girl to run away he says. Go ahead, lust. Darling go for it, after all isn't this what you want?

my summer. I know I haven't really been around, But im changing that. I brought my self into a world of lies, drugs, and despair. I chose that life over the summer. I didn't see myself in the mirror. I fell in love, and I don't have to explain this to any of you. I used to think that if you really loved someone, you had to prove to your friends that you loved that "special someone." Listen, you don't have to prove anything to anybody. You know what your feeling. the crazy knots in your stomach, the way he sucks out your air, and breathes it into you. The way you can look into his eyes, or if he cries when he says he loves you. The best thing that happened to me was love, and now im worried sick about him, and i let him slip.
